Package waitersProgram.model

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
waitersProgram.model.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuInterface
public class Menu extends Object implements MenuInterface
The Menu class. The menu contains all the dishes and drinks offered by the restaurant. The items are both stored in a LinkedHashMap (during program runtime), and in a .txt file in order to ensure persistance. Each line of menuFile.txt must respect "dishName, dishPrice format. The methods for adding and removing an item update both the LinkedHashMap and the .txt file."

    • addMenuEntry

      public void addMenuEntry​(String dishEntry)
      Method that creates a new menu entry after checking its format with checkForEntryFormat. The method adds the entry both to entries LinkedHashMap and to menuFile.txt.
      Specified by:
      addMenuEntry in interface MenuInterface
      Parameters:
      dishEntry - represents the new entry to add.

    • removeMenuEntry

      public void removeMenuEntry​(String dishEntry)
      Method that removes a MenuEntry from menuFile.txt given his "stringed" representation and calls rewriteMenu() in order to recreate entries LinkedHashMap.
      Specified by:
      removeMenuEntry in interface MenuInterface
      Parameters:
      dishEntry - specifies the entry to be removed in dishName, dishPrice format.

    • removeMenuEntry

      public void removeMenuEntry​(Integer entryKey)
      Method that removes a MenuEntry from entries LinkedHashMap given his key number. The method calls removeMenuEntry.
      Specified by:
      removeMenuEntry in interface MenuInterface
      Parameters:
      entryKey - represents the key of the entry to be deleted.
